root.name: Kwazy Kwaks
root.description: OverviewKwazy Kwaks is a shooting game developed and published by Mr. Chip Software for the VIC-20 platform. Kwazy Kwaks was only released in European regions.GameplayIn Kwazy Kwaks the player takes control of a gun which is located at the bottom of the screen. At the top of the screen there are three rows of various targets including: numbers, ducks, rabbits, and owls. The rows will move to either the left or the right and the player must aim and try to shoot the various targets.The higher row targets are worth more points than those in the lower levels. Players start with a limited amount of ammunition for the gun, however more ammunition can be gained by shooting the various number targets.After each stage is completed, the speed of the game will increase and the targets will be harder to hit.
